about_the_game:
Tavern Legends is a medieval tavern simulation game in first-person perspective. You start with a small tavern and can, once enough gold is earned, expand your tavern and acquire new ones.

Immerse yourself in a quaint atmospheric town from the 14th century with cozy village squares, lively streets, and hearty locals. The town is freely explorable, there is much to discover, and you even have your own home!

Work Hard

Everyone starts small. At first, you’re on your own. Sweep the floors, wipe down tables, pour drinks to your heart's content, and fill your guests' bellies. Quick service is rewarded with satisfaction and tips. If you make your guests wait too long, word will spread, and your tavern will become unpopular.

Building System

Design your tavern according to your own vision. Decide where guests will sit, where the bar will be, and where cooking will take place. Keep paths short and plan your storage areas wisely to create optimal work routes. Decorate your tavern with new table settings, carpets, lighting, and more, as this will affect your tavern's rating.

Management

Manage your food, store your ingredients, and ensure a steady supply. Each tavern can be customized as you wish. Should it be a classy restaurant or a rowdy nightspot? Only you decide when, where, and what selection is available.

Be a Businessman

Tired of getting your hands dirty? No problem, hire people to work for you. Whether it's a cook, waiter, or cleaner, set up workflows and manage your staff. Each one has specific strengths and weaknesses, which can only be managed through good coordination.

Gain Popularity

Increase your popularity in the city to attract higher-quality guests. Not everyone is the same. Every resident has a specific rank, from beggar, common citizen, guard, to even mage. For example, a beggar has low demands but is not willing to pay as much as a noble. A noble has higher expectations and will spend more gold, but won’t appreciate if only beggars are present, which can lead to a lower rating. Be cautious with price increases, as they can bring in more income and higher-ranked guests, but might also deter the lower class from visiting.

With enough influence, you’ll upgrade your tavern’s level and unlock new items and facilities!

Be Creative

Design your menu with meals you’ve created yourself. Choose from a variety of ingredients and refine them with spices. Quality matters here too. The higher the quality and variety of your food, the higher the rank of your guests. Each guest has specific preferences, and more variations will increase their satisfaction.

Dynamic Weather

Experience a dynamic world with stunning weather effects and a realistic day-night cycle. Whether it’s bright sunshine, gentle rain, dense fog, or a roaring thunderstorm – the weather changes seamlessly and affects not only the mood but also the gameplay. Rain will drive citizens to seek refuge in the tavern, creating more mess, which impacts the cleanliness of your establishment.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.3GHz or AMD @ 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU, 6GB dedicated VRAM (GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Though not required, SSD for storage and 16 GB of memory is recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5/i7 @ 4GHz or Ryzen 5 @ 4GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 12 compatible GPU, 8GB dedicated VRAM (GeForce GTX 1660 / Radeon RX 590)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Though not required, SSD for storage is recommended

short_description: Tavern Legends is a medieval tavern simulation. Fulfill the needs of various patrons and design taverns according to your vision. Create your own meals, manage your inventory, and hire workers. Become a legendary tavern keeper!
supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
